QuestData.Title: Gaining the Advantage
QuestData.Description: The troops of the Shattered Sun Offensive will need every advantage they can get to beat back the allies of Kil'Jaeden. My colleagues in Stormwind have created oils which will strengthen the blades and armor of our troops.$B$BThe key ingredient, nether residue, pervades Outland -- if you know where to look. Any master herbalist, skinner, or miner who knows the signs can gather it while plying $g his:her; trade. Those herbs, ores, and beasts native to Outland may all bear the residue.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring 8 Nether Residue to Emissary Mordin in Shattrath City.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you any residue for me?
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you for your help, $n. No contribution to the war effort is too small. Our men are going to need every advantage they can get in this battle.
